com.wedeploy.android.auth

Class TokenAuthorization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wedeploy.android.auth.TokenAuthorization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authorization

    public class TokenAuthorization
extends java.lang.Object
implements Authorization
    The TokenAuthorization encapsulates a token provided by WeDeploy. It must be provided to requests to WeDeploy that requires authentication.
    See Also:
    WeDeployAuth.signIn(String, String), WeDeployAuth.signIn(Activity, ProviderAuthorization)

        public static Authorization getAuthorizationFromIntent(Intent intent)
        Gets an Authorization from a Intent returned after successfully executing WeDeployAuth.signIn(Activity, ProviderAuthorization)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Authorization The authorization object.
